comment: Pretty easy class that doesn't require a ton of effort. Weekly *graded* chapter assignments, 3 discussion posts, 2 projects, and 4 exams (no lockdown browser or webcam). She did take a while to grade assignments, but other than that she's a good professor!

She is the best professor I have ever had. I was interested in the class. No tests, just quizzes, surveys, and chapter assignments. I genuinely enjoyed this class and she is genuinely extremely kind. 10/10 recommend
